objects.text:
100% Pure, Farm-Fresh Whole Milk
Rich in essential nutrients and calcium
No artificial additives or preservatives
Naturally creamy texture and rich taste

product_details.name: Farm Fresh Premium Dairy Milk - Pure & Natural Goodness
product_details.description:
• 100% Pure, Farm-Fresh Whole Milk
• No artificial additives or preservatives
• Rich in essential nutrients and calcium
• Pasteurized for safety while preserving natural taste
• Perfect for drinking, cooking, and baking
• Available in convenient glass bottles and pitchers
• Sourced from local dairy farms
• Naturally creamy texture and rich taste
• High in protein and vitamin D
• Ideal for growing children and active adults

banner_details:
The banner showcases a clean and modern layout promoting a premium milk product. It features a bold, dark blue heading at the top ("heading") with a large, eye-catching font, followed by a lighter blue subheading ("subheading") slightly below it. The central area includes a neatly-aligned multiline product description ("description") in a clean sans-serif typeface, emphasizing natural and quality aspects of the milk. On the right side, a realistically rendered image ("product_image") of milk in a glass, jug, and bottle adds visual appeal. The bottom-left section contains the price text ("price"), and a prominent call-to-action button ("cta_background" and "cta") encouraging user interaction. The background uses layered waves and a double-bordered, soft blue and white frame with rounded corners, lending a fresh, organic feel.

**Color Palette:**
- Deep Blue: #1B5E89
- Sky Blue: #3498DB
- Light Sky/Background: #F5FAFE
- Text Gray: #2C3E50
- White: #FFFFFF
product_color: The product image showcases milk in clear glass containers, using a clean and minimalist color palette. Dominant colors include bright white from the milk (#FFFFFF), icy blue from the glass accents (#A3D3F5), subtle gray shadows (#D3D3D3), and light reflections (#F5F5F5). These colors blend naturally, emphasizing freshness and purity. The cool blue hues create a calming contrast with the milk’s warm white tone, making the product appear clean and wholesome. For an advertisement banner, a palette featuring White (#FFFFFF), Ice Blue (#A3D3F5), Light Gray (#D3D3D3), and Soft Silver (#F5F5F5) would convey cool freshness and natural richness effectively.
